name: Midnight Expresso
description: Midnight Expresso is a Visual Novel that can turn into a cute monster dating sim or a horror game depending on how the player makes decisions. The player is an experienced barista at a coffee shop and has to train a new Barista. The game is played through decisions made during conversations with other characters or just actions. The game starts off as a "normal" dating simulation between the player and the new Barista but as the game goes on strange things start to happen to make the player question the Barista’s humanity. In a high stress situation the player has to decide how they will treat the barista. Will they continue to think of the barista as a friend and possible love interest? Or will they think of the Barista as a monster who must be stopped? This decision will change the game into either a continuation of the dating sim or a horror game where the player and Barista play a dangerous game of cat and mouse.
